sentences.en: Macadam type bases involving successive layers of crushed rock bound with rock dust were also used.
sentences.cn: 人们曾经使用“石结”基层——几层由石粉黏结在一起连续的碎石层.

sentences.en: Surface with macadam , of a road.
sentences.cn: 在路的表面用碎石覆盖。

sentences.en: The construction techniques of cement treated macadam base are always paid more attention by highway constructors.
sentences.cn: 水泥稳定碎石基层的施工技术历来被公路施工单位所重视.

words.tran_cn: 以碎石铺路，在路面铺设碎石；简易地铺装

trans.tran_cn: 铺路用的碎石料，柏油碎石路
trans.tran_en: a road surface made of a mixture of broken stones and  tar  or  asphalt
